attributes.action: act to prevent people smoking in entrances and close proximity to public buildings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the long awaited ban on smoking in public places smokers have taken to congregating at the entrances to public places.  It is impossible to enter or exit many buildings without running the gauntlet of a posse of smokers.  This smoke is not only very unpleasent but finds its way into buidings each time the doors are opened.  The government is to be applaued for its restriction on smoking to date but it needs to go further.
